technology.description:
Check this to generate Facet navigation features associated to the designed objects of your data models.
Facet Navigation allows to drill drown through object categories.
SIDE allows to optimize the generation of the Facetmap components based on the newly designed objects of your data models.
technology.name: Facet Navigation

technologyVersion.description:
Check this to generate Facet navigation components on the major release 2 of the Facetmap library.
Facetmap 2.x is one of the more efficient and robust Facet navigation component which may be easily embedded in web application.
Additionally to content generation, SIDE provides the generated components to integrate Facet navigation features according to the designed application objects.

configurationParameter.documentation:
Set this value to the Alfresco Tomcat directory path in order the deployer puts the packaged war file.
This option is mandatory.
configurationParameter.label: Tomcat installation directory

option.documentation:
Check this option if you want to completely remove previous deployed packages.
May be longer but may avoid some side effects when done from time to time.
option.label: clean webapp
